name: SK Contact Form
short_description:
The goal of this program will be to create a simple but effective contact form for MediaWiki websites.

This is mostly a learning project, so features will be added over time.

The planned features include:
-A special page where authorized users can view submitted forms
-Specification in LocalSettings.php of email addresses to email form results to
-An interfaces for authorized users to add and remove email addresses for sending form information to
summary: This program will setup a simple contact form for MediaWiki websites
